opinion.posture: An action for damages for fraud and deceit. Judgment for defendant.
opinion.opinion_text: Judgment affirmed en banc without written opinion.
opinion.posture: Error to the District Court of the City and County of Denver,Hon. Robert W. Steele, Judge.
opinion.attorneys:
Mr. H. GORDON HOWARD, for plaintiffs in error.
Messrs. McDOUGAL KLINGSMITH, for defendant in error.
